data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S4 Mini, Android 7.1.2 (Lineage OS 14.1)
data.actual_result: Although you press everything in the Audit Logs screen, nothing will happen.
data.expected_result: The other entries in the Audit Log should be opened.
data.short_description: If you turn off the screen and turn it on again, Audit Logs will not work.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Audit Logs - Select something - Press power button (turn off screen) - Turn on the screen and go back to Discord - You can't press anything, just the "back" button.
